Wisdom.quote: "The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom." (Proverbs 9:10)

Illumination.quote: "I am the light of the world." (John 8:12)

Gnosis.quote: "Know thyself and thou shalt know the universe and God." (Temple of Delphi)

Revelation.quote: "He reveals deep and hidden things; he knows what lies in darkness." (Daniel 2:22)

Insight.quote: "The eye with which I see God is the same eye with which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Awareness.quote: "Pure awareness is beyond mind, beyond being and non-being." (Ashtavakra Gita 1:12)

Comprehension.quote: "The intellect is a clear mirror reflecting the divine light." (Al-Ghazali)

Realization.quote: "When the mind is still, the truth reveals itself." (Buddha)

Perception.quote: "The eye of the soul is not separate from the soul's substance." (Plotinus)

Intelligence.quote: "The intelligence of the universe is sacred." (Marcus Aurelius, Meditations)

Discernment.quote: "Test everything; hold fast what is good." (1 Thessalonians 5:21)

Consciousness.quote: "Consciousness is the lamp through which the Divine Light shines." (Ramana Maharshi)

Recognition.quote: "To know That by which all else is known." (Kena Upanishad)

Knowing.quote: "Knowledge of the self is the mother of all knowledge." (Khalil Gibran)

Apprehension.quote: "The divine is knowable through direct apprehension." (Plotinus, Enneads)

Understanding.quote: "Understanding is the reward of faith." (Augustine of Hippo)

Enlightenment.quote: "When delusion ends, the light of wisdom shines forth." (Patanjali)

Omniscience.quote: "Nothing in all creation is hidden from God's sight." (Hebrews 4:13)

Intuition.quote: "Divine knowledge comes through intuitive flash." (Sri Aurobindo)

Awakening.quote: "Awake, arise, and stop not till the goal is reached." (Vivekananda)
